segments.text: I glance at the overflowing sink, and I feel a hint of disgust at the sight of such neglect.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so completely lost in her task that she can’t see the flooding disaster behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron is pristine, yet the kitchen is slipping into chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a wave of sadness wash over me as I realize how easily she could fix it if she just noticed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the boy is on the stool, his face lighting up at the thought of cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s both adorable and alarming, watching him reach into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His determination is endearing, but I dread what could happen next.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl’s eager hand reaching up for a cookie adds to the spectacle of this little caper.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but feel a little jealous of their carefree joy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the thought of the impending consequences brings me back to reality.
segments.speaker: PAR
